about.text1: I have more then 3 years of experience in UI development, of which 2 years is development on React and React Native. For the last 1,5 years I have been working in an international team of developers using the Agile methodology. Before worked for a football team for a long time and learned to quickly build good relationships with team-mates. I can say that I am a team player. I love sports, I run marathons, I have twice completed the Ironman distance (swimming, cycling, running).
about.text2_p1: React Native • React.js • JavaScript • Typescript • Flutter • Node.js • HTML • CSS • Redux Toolkit • MobX • REST API • Git
